snippet: The private equity firm BC Partners and the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board have agreed to buy the American cable operator Suddenlink Communications for $6.6 billion.
abstract: The private equity firm BC Partners and the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board have agreed to buy the American cable operator Suddenlink Communications for $6.6 billion.

headline.main: Group Led by BC Partners to Buy U.S. Cable Operator for $6.6 Billion
